name: Amazon Black NightMode Dark
description:
Avoid that eye pain. Go Dark.

Top Ad bar("New to Amazon items")
3 options
1) hide the element
2) display just a black image
3) invert the image to make it fit better in the dark.

#nav-upnav {/*Ad Tag at Top*/
display: none !important;
